name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Alvin JOYNER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, former C.J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Alvin JOYNER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, former C.J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Garold Tennis, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
455 A.2d 629
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Alvin JOYNER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 9, 1982.
Decided Jan. 31, 1983.
Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Garold Tennis, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
